title: I’m a Retired Pro Cyclist. Here’s Why I Still Return to Gran Fondos like the Tour de Scottsdale.
content:
The spirit and camaraderie of cycling is alive and well at Gran Fondos.

Read the full article at I’m a Retired Pro Cyclist. Here’s Why I Still Return to Gran Fondos like the Tour de Scottsdale. on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
